--- alter_table_alter_column.sql
alter table foo alter column foo string(256) not null
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AlterColumn{
    Alter: 16,
    Name:  &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 29,
      NameEnd: 32,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
    Alteration: &ast.AlterColumnType{
      Type: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
        NamePos: 33,
        Rparen:  43,
        Name:    "STRING",
        Max:     false,
        Size:    &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 40,
          ValueEnd: 43,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "256",
        },
      },
      Null:        49,
      NotNull:     true,
      DefaultExpr: (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ALTER COLUMN foo STRING(256) NOT NULL
